subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Already an icon in his native Colombia, Camilo Villegas has attracted a media entourage to the W.G.C.-CA Championship at Doral that would be impressive even for Tiger Woods.
snippet: Already an icon in his native Colombia, Camilo Villegas has attracted a media entourage to the W.G.C.-CA Championship at Doral that would be impressive even for Tiger Woods.
